name: Lucio Mauro Duarte
content: Lucio Mauro Duarte - INF/UFRGS Lucio Mauro Duarte ====== Degrees ====== B.Sc. in Informatics, Faculdade de Informática (FACIN) da Pontifícia Universidade Católica do Rio Grande do Sul (PUCRS), Brazil, 1999. Final project: "MOOM: a Monitor of Mobile Objects", under the supervision of Dr Fernando Luís Dotti. (in Portuguese) M.Sc. in Computer Science, Programa de Pós-Graduação em Ciência da Computação (PPGCC) da Faculdade de Informática (FACIN) da Pontifícia Universidade Católica do Rio Grande do Sul (PUCRS), Brazil, 2002. M.Sc. thesis: "Development of Distributed Systems with Mobile Code through Formal Specification", under the supervision of Dr Fernando Luís Dotti. Ph.D. in Computing, Department of Computing, Imperial College London, University of London, UK, 2007. Tese: "Behaviour Model Extraction Using Context Information", under the supervision of Prof. Jeff Kramer and Dr Sebastian Uchitel. ====== Research Group ====== VeriTes - Validation, Verification and Testing Group Labelled Transition Systems Extractor (LTSE) tool ===== Topics of Interest ===== Software Behaviour Models Software Validation, Verification, and Testing Software Evolution and Maintenance Quantitative Analysis of Systems ===== Publications =====**2018** DUARTE, Lucio Mauro; MAIA, Paulo Henrique Mendes; SILVA, Ana Carolina Sanchotene. "Extraction of Probabilistic Behaviour Models Based on Contexts." In: Proceedings of the ACM/IEEE 10th International Workshop on Modelling in Software Engineering (MiSE 2018), Gothenburg, Sweden, 2018. p. 25-32. **2017** DUARTE, Lucio Mauro; RIBEIRO, Leila. "Graph Grammar Extraction from Source Code." In: Cavalheiro S., Fiadeiro J. (eds) Formal Methods: Foundations and Applications. SBMF 2017. Lecture Notes in Computer Science, vol 10623, Springer, 2017. p. 52-69. DUARTE, Lucio Mauro. "Experimentos com o Refinamento de Modelos Baseados em Contextos." In: Anais do IV Workshop-Escola de Informática Teórica (WEIT 2017), Santa Maria/RS, Brasil, Outubro de 2017, p. 204-211. DUARTE, Lucio Mauro; KRAMER, Jeff; UCHITEL, Sebastian. "Using Contexts to Extract Models from Code." In: Software and Systems Modeling 16(2), May 2017, p. 523-557. **2016** LUMERTZ, Paulo Roberto; RIBEIRO, Leila; DUARTE, Lucio Mauro. "User Interfaces Metamodel Based on Graphs." In: Journal of Visual Languages & Computing, v. 32, February 2016, p. 1–34. **2014** REIS FILHO, Heitor Boeira; CORREA, Ulisses Brisolara; DUARTE, Lucio Mauro; BECK, Antonio Carlos Schneider. "Analysis of the Impact of Refactorings on the Performance of Embedded Systems." In: SBESC 2014, p. 97-102. OLIVEIRA JUNIOR, Marcos Antonio; RIBEIRO, Leila; COTA, Érika Fernandes; DUARTE, Lucio Mauro; NUNES, Ingrid; REIS, Filipe. "Use Case Analysis Based on Formal Methods: An Empirical Study." In: Simpósio Brasileiro de Métodos Formais, 2014, Maceió/AL. Anais do Congresso Brasileiro de Software 2014, 2014, p. 22-27. **2013** DUARTE, Lucio Mauro. "Behaviour Model Extraction from Software." In: 2nd Workshop-School on Theoretical Computer Science (WEIT), 2013, p. 1-8. OLIVEIRA JUNIOR, Marcos Antonio; RIBEIRO, Leila; DUARTE, Lucio Mauro; COTA, Érika Fernandes. "Integrating Software Testing and Model Checking Through Model Extraction." In: 14th Brazilian Symposium on Formal Methods (SBMF) : short papers, São Paulo/SP, 2011, p. 73-78. **2010** DUARTE, Lucio Mauro; FOSS, Luciana; WAGNER, Flávio Rech; HEIMFARTH, Tales. Bento Gonçalves, 9500 Porto Alegre/RS 91501-970 - Brazil Phone: +55 (51) 3308 - 7126 lmduarte <at> inf <dot> ufrgs <dot> br Homepage: http://www.inf.ufrgs.br/~lmduarte
